Key.English: Enables CQB persistence (requires ALiVE Data Module)
Key.Chinesesimp: 启用CQB持久性(需要ALiVE数据模块)

Key.English: Max group size spawned per CQB location
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个CQB位置生成的最大组大小

Key.English: Chooses the factions of CQB units
Chooses the type of buildings in which CQB will be present
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择CQB将出现的建筑类型

Key.English: Probability in % that a house will be occupied
Only one CQB module can be used
Place the CQB module and select the preferred intensity. Optionally, CQB can be synced to a Mil/Civ Placement module.
Key.Chinesesimp: 放置CQB模块并选择首选强度。或者,CQB可以同步到Mil/Civ Placement模块。

Key.English: Selects the type of area in which CQB will be available. If synced to a Mil/Civ Placement module this setting will be overwritten
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择CQB可用的区域类型。如果同步到Mil/Civ Placement模块,此设置将被覆盖

Key.English: Markers where no CQB will be present (optional)
Markers where CQB will be present (optional, opposite to Blacklist)
Key.Chinesesimp: CQB将出现的标记(可选,与黑名单相对)

Key.English: CQB will determine the dominant faction or use static factions from the faction param fields
Key.Chinesesimp: CQB将确定主导势力或使用势力参数字段中的静态势力

Key.English: Density of additional CQB placement. Adds more house locations with a minimum distance of x metres to each other, resulting in a tight grid of CQB positions.
Percentage chance units might patrol around their spawn point.
Key.Chinesesimp: 单位可能在刷新点附近巡逻

Key.English: Percentage chance units will search nearby houses at a patrol waypoint.
Key.Chinesesimp: 单位在巡逻航路点搜索附近房屋的几率

Key.English: Seconds. Minimum threshold time the group will stop and wait at each waypoint.
Key.Chinesesimp: 秒.小组将在每个航路点停止并等待的最小阈值时间.

Key.English: Seconds. Median threshold time the group will stop and wait at each waypoint.
Key.Chinesesimp: 秒.小组将在每个航路点停止并等待的中间阈值时间.

Key.English: Seconds. Maximum threshold time the group will stop and wait at each waypoint.
Key.Chinesesimp: 秒.小组将在每个航路点停止并等待的最大阈值时间.

Key.English: If group is patrolling, then the patrol radius will be no smaller than this value. The radius will be randomly calculated for each group between minimum and maximum patrol radius.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果小组正在巡逻,则巡逻半径将不小于此值.每组的半径将在最小和最大巡逻半径之间随机计算.

Key.English: If group is patrolling, then the group radius will be no bigger than this value. The radius will be randomly calculated for each group between minimum and maximum patrol radius.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果小组正在巡逻,则巡逻半径将不大于此值.每组的半径将在最小和最大巡逻半径之间随机计算.

Key.English: Spawn distance for ground units. Note that spawn distance for strategic placements is a factor 1.4 of this value
Key.Chinesesimp: 地面单位的生成距离。请注意,战略部署的生成距离是该值的系数1.4

Key.English: Spawn distance for static weapons. Note that spawn distance for strategic placements is a factor 1.4 of this value
Key.Chinesesimp: 静态武器的生成距离。请注意,战略部署的生成距离是该值的系数1.4

Key.English: Spawn distance for helicopters (0 to disable spawning). Note that spawn distance for strategic placements is a factor 1.4 of this value
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机的兵距离(0表示禁用生成)。请注意,战略部署的产卵距离是该值的系数1.4

Key.English: Spawn distance for aircraft (0 to disable spawning). Note that spawn distance for strategic placements is a factor 1.4 of this value
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞机生成距离(0表示生成禁用)。请注意,战略部署生成的距离是该值的系数1.4

Key.English: Density of static weapon emplacements in CQB areas, such as mortars and machine guns
Key.Chinesesimp: CQB区域的静态武器安放密度,如迫击炮和机枪

Key.English: Blacklist Units from this CQB module (optional)
Key.Chinesesimp: 本CQB模块的黑名单单位(可选)
